item.title: AMERICAN SOFTWARE INC 10-K
item.description: AMERICAN SOFTWARE INC, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 29, 2022 had 27967 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: software - 284 instances may - 278 instances revenue - 272 instances 2022 - 269 instances company - 257 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
